title: Rewards All Around!
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>Are you sure you want to help out today too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>It’s totally fine! As I said before, I owe a lot to this shrine.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Then I’ll give you another reward, Hanayo-chan...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ah, wait, wait! That’s my job today!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Remember when I helped out here last time? You treated me to pancakes and cream soda as a reward, Nozomi-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>That place was delicious, wasn’t it~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yeah! ...I mean! Nozomi-chan deserves a reward too! So today, I’ll give you a reward!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>What!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Why are you so surprised? It’s okay for me to give you a reward, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I’m happy, but... you’re helping me out today too, right...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>The spring limited-time drink is almost gone, so let’s drink it with all the toppings!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Hey, Hanayo-chan, are you listening...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
